author: Francesco de Nicola
description: Francesco’s inspiration: “My cocktail is inspired by food pairing and the union between the bar and the kitchen. The ingredients are all locally sourced and sustainable but can be found worldwide.”
name: El Bate

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
<strong>Special ingredient #1<strong>: Homemade vegetable stock (250ml vegetable stock infused with celery, carrots and 500g sugar in water for 20 minutes)
